fields.label: Type
fields.description: Valfritt medieelement. Elementet vil bli plassert over spørsmålet.

semantics.label: Oppgåvebeskriving
semantics.description: Forklar hvordan brukeren skal løyse oppgåva.
semantics.placeholder: Click on all the verbs in the text that follows.

important.description:
• Marked words are added with an asterisk (*).
  • Asterisks can be added within marked words by adding another asterisk, *correctword*** => correctword*.
important.example: The correct words are marked like this: *correctword*, an asterisk is written like this: *correctword***.

fields.label: Opprett poengområde og legg inn tilbakemeldingar.
fields.description: Klikk på knappen "Legg til poengområde" og legg til så mange poengområde du treng. Døme: 0–40 % Svakt resultat, 41–80 % Gjennomsnittleg resultat, 81–100 % Flott resultat!

semantics.label: Innstillinger for oppgave-åtferd
semantics.description: Disse instillingene lar deg bestemme hvordan oppgavetypen skal oppføre seg.

fields.label: Show score points
fields.description: Show points earned for each answer.

semantics.label: Riktig svar tekst
semantics.description: Text used to indicate that an answer is correct

semantics.label: Feil svar tekst
semantics.description: Text used to indicate that an answer is incorrect

semantics.label: Mangler svar tekst
semantics.description: Text used to indicate that an answer is missing

semantics.label: Beskrivelse for Vis Løsning
semantics.default: Oppgåva er oppdatert til å innehalde fasiten.
semantics.description: This text tells the user that the tasks has been updated with the solution.

semantics.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Label for the full readable text for assistive technologies
Label for the text where words can be marked for assistive technologies
semantics.default: Fullstendig tekst der ord kan bli markerte

semantics.label: Solution mode header for assistive technologies
Checking mode header for assistive technologies
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
semantics.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
semantics.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
semantics.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
